sub_title: Policy | Governance and Development | Project Management
summary: I am passionate about participatory development, civic advocacy, human rights, sexual and reproductive health rights, education, animals, and travel. I am interested in working in the development sector with a special focus on Public Health, Education, Social Policy and SRHR policy.

school.name: International Institute of Social Studies (ISS) of Erasmus University Rotterdam

awards.title: Best Thesis Award
awards.description:
The Best Thesis Award is bestowed by the Academic Board of the Consortium of the Erasmus Mundus Masters Program in Public Policy (Mundus MAPP). 
This honour was awarded for an outstanding masters thesis written in the Governance and Development specialization in the 2017-2019 cohort of Mundus MAPP.
awards.issuer: The Academic Board of the Consortium of the Erasmus Mundus Masters Program in Public Policy

authors.headline: Policy | Governance and Development | Project Management

profile_positions.description: Lead strategic, cross-functional, complex and multi- client projects for our end-users. Analyse problems, design solutions that are fit-for-purpose, and implement end-to-end. Work closely with senior management, C-level executives and external stakeholders across the organisations (grantmaking teams, regional teams, and Constanter Philanthropy Services teams).
profile_positions.title: Global Solutions Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Lead on technical and strategic management of R&D and Strategic Engagement projects, including design, initiation, planning, budgeting, execution, monitoring, closing, donor reporting, and stakeholder management
- Overseeing the organisational programme coordination and administration of the Global Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs Portfolio, with a focus on multi-team budget lines and deliverable tracking including MEL, Communications etc
- Realise projects within budget in a cost effective and efficient manner - working on projects of annual values upto 5 million 
- Lead on Annual Work Plan and Annual Reporting processes - liaising across the organisation with Senior Management - Programmatic, Strategic and Operational leadership
- Active participation in business development processes - proposal writing and budgeting
- Change management through the organisational realignment process 
- Resource Management and proactive risk mitigation and management of change requests to be administratively compliant
- Contributing to an enabling environment for on the job capacity development for project staff
- Lead on large scale event management involving high-level stakeholders from across the world including high level government and judicial representatives
- Operational Lead on organisation wide internal Training Programme
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.company: The Global Network of People Living with HIV (GNP+)
profile_positions.description:
- Lead on organisational governance and regulatory compliance processes including annual reporting, risk assessment and management, matters at the chamber of commerce as well as engaging with the notary and company lawyers
- Engage in programmatic grant writing processes and ensure strategic alignment across multiple programmes in furtherance of organisational advocacy goals
- Ensuring the efficient and effective use of organisational resources through, among other things, participating in strategic planning, assessing the management and resource implications of proposed actions as part of senior management team 
- Primary liaison between Board and Executive Leadership - organising internal organisational communication and high level programmes dashboard among others
- Lead on GDPR related obligations, confidential reporting mechanisms and other organisational policies
- Oversight on strategic communications both visual and written on social media as well as direct partner conversations 
- Cultivating and maintaining strategic partnerships and relations with donors and partners
- Externally representing the organisation in governance, advocacy and policy spaces
- Supporting Board and Executive Leadership at high-level fora through framing of organisational positioning in terms of advocacy goals in alignment with the strategic framework
- Setting up and monitoring the annual governance work plan including supporting the board to deliver on the goals 
- Leading on internal governance evolution process including a deep dive on the executive leadership model
- Manage Board replenishment processes and annual review processes for board and executive leadership
profile_positions.title: Governance Advisor

profile_positions.company: The Global Network of People Living with HIV (GNP+)
profile_positions.description:
- Providing governance and logistical support to the Board, including operationalising Board meetings and co-developing agendas and timelines
- Operationalising Board meetings and co-developing organisational agenda setting
- Co-developing a board capacity development programme
- Supporting board replenishment process
- Providing comprehensive, efficient and high-quality administrative, as well as analytical support to the Executive Director, Secretariat and the Board
- Supporting the Head of Programmes and Executive Director on related functions within the Secretariat, including Communications and Events
profile_positions.title: Governance Officer

profile_positions.description:
- Creating long term strategic programme, co-developing and overseeing programme design and implementation. 
- Liaisoning with partner organisations on behalf of the IYF, and representing IYF in external meetings. 
- Fundraising, evaluation and monitoring internal audit alongside the treasurer.
profile_positions.title: Chair | Founding Board Member

company.name: Janaagraha Centre for Citizenship and Democracy

profile_positions.description:
- Working on achieving large-scale reforms in strengthening revenues, municipal staffing, financial health of local governments, etc
- Coordinating with government departments, on-ground personnel, government consultants and external stakeholders to collect and collate data, analyse data and create actionable reports for on ground deployment, with special focus on areas of Municipal Finance and Municipal staffing and identifying contemporary trends and advocacy agendas
- Creating a framework for the communication of financial data of local governments to citizens to build awareness and regulatory compliance
- Engagement with and persuasion of government functionaries to administer robust reforms urban local governance
profile_positions.title: Associate - Governance Reforms

profile_positions.description:
- Advocating for meaningful participation and inclusion of young people in the development of the sexual and reproductive health rights advocacy agenda
- Co-creating a youth space (the Global Youth Village) as a part of the International AIDS conference 2018
- Chaired the youth-pre conference in the lead up to the International AIDS conference, leading on pre-conference programming, budgeting, session planning, liaising with donors and workshop panelists, and co-creating a youth volunteer programme
- Lead on the drafting of the official young people's statement on meaningful youth participation in comprehensive sexual and reproductive health rights policy
- Planned and executed a transition of the Amsterdam Youth Force to the International Youth Force
profile_positions.title: Member of Secretariat | Youth Pre-Conference Organising Committee Chair

profile_positions.description:
- Plan, teach and assess English, Math and integrated values, mindsets, exposure and access curriculum for fourth and fifth graders at a low-income government school
- School Team Lead – responsible for accountability and transparency in relations of fellows, school and government – implemented through a school relations monthly tracker submitted to the organisation and the government
- Worked closely with local government (Gram Panchayat, Block Education Officer, and Cluster Representative Person) with regard to matters dealing with school outreach, infrastructure, teacher shortage, etc
- Raised funds to combat teaching staff shortage and school infrastructure development including transforming the school building into a learning aid, a fully equipped computer lab for students and teachers, a school library with reading level specific books for students
- Mentored and organised student-led Design for Change Project in the community
- Creating child-friendly and accessible content on the Right to Education
- Social Media management of the school profile in the interest of fundraising, and running a successful volunteer programme through CSR
- Organised a Teacher Training programme for computer literacy for other government school teachers
profile_positions.title: Fellow

profile_positions.description: Research and analysis - Large scale assessment and impact within Primary and Secondary School Education in India, with a focus both State Level Assessment Surveys and National Achievement Surveys.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
-  Teaching assistant under Professors C. Rajkumar and Stephen P. Marks for Human Rights, Development and Governance
-  Formulating a course manual and reading for the course as a whole 
-  Formulating and conducting in-class simulations
-  Attending regular teaching hours and assisting in logistical details of the course
-  Worked as a Teaching assistant under Prof. M. Gandhi for Public International Law 
-  Formulating a course manual and reading for the course as a whole 
-  Conducting regular tutorial hours 
-  Setting and grading student assignments 
-  Additionally assisted in formulation of a bridge course on Humanities – including teaching time of 4 hours.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Student Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Conducting research and surveys regarding the Death Penalty in India
- Awaiting publication of co-edited report on “Mental Health Care Programmes For School Children: Beyond Learning Disability”
profile_positions.title: Graduate Student Researcher

profile_positions.description:
-  Conducted research on Health Law across the world – special focus on access to free public healthcare. 
-  Conducted research on the right the education in India.
-  Conducted research on the death penalty and the jurisprudence of the same in India and comparatively with the US and Europe.
profile_positions.title: Research Intern

volunteer_experiences.description: Taught Mathematics and English to children of the age group of 8 – 14.
